message.body: Hi Kennedy its aisha. I was thinking of coming around 4:00-ish..is that cool?
Ok sweet...see you then :)
Sure!
I'm here i think..
Wassah...when would you like me to come over and sling some paint or whatever you want me to do? :)
Whenever!
Okey dokey...be there soon-ish...
Ello...what's up today? Are you in your studio?
Cool...I can come by around then.
Not til 6 today....
Heya! How was camping? I hear yr roommate has some bike cable for me...any chance I can get that from ya this afternoon/eve?
Hey...camping was great, but I'm glad to have slept in my bed last night...ummm...I don't know anything about the bike cable. I can ask them and find out
where it is and whatnot.
Coolcool, thanks!
Hey sorry I took so long to get back with you. I fucked up the message and everything got all confused... but yeah that bike cable is here.
Wooo, no worries, Derrick said he'll be home after 7 for me to get it. You rock!
Cool...I'm glad its working out. I can come help this week....probably Wednesday and beyond.
Awesome!
Oh yeah....I can definitely help with that...how fun is that? We get to drink and eat to come up with a mixed drink!!! Amazing!!
Hell yells :D
Wooo! Best work ever!
Hey...would you want me to do some rum-gummi bears and bring those Saturday?
Yea gummy bears!
Grrr....I can't do them now...they have to soak for three days....Hahaha...I can do them over the weekend though. :)
Oh! Party on the 20th, not this Saturday!
Hehe...yeah, I just read that. Ok, so that works out well. :) yay!!!!
Hey...Im available today if you have stuff needin doin...lemme know :) I'm gonna get those gummy bears started soaking tomorrow muhahahaha.
Yup! :)
Yea! I'll be there around 6:30 if you wanna stop by! Mmm...gummies...
I'm here...
All his paint and none is white hahaha..ah well, at least the bears are becoming engorged with alcohol ;) whenever u do get paint let me know and I'll co
me finish painting.
Haha. Yeah.
Yay, thanks! Mmmm...engorged....
Hey!!! Are you in your studio?
Haha...can I come paint?
Eyes
Okey dokey...be there soon.
Sure!
Comedy tonight at the Barbary...doors open at 9, comedy starts at 10. Not sure about cover, but probably like $5.00 if any...yay!!!
Mmm, prolly can't... But will letcha know if that changes! Thanks!
Ok
Hey lady...when should I come over?
Ok. I'll letcha know. :)
Whenevs!
On my way, got turned around getting off the el.
Ok!
Hey lady...before i forget again, we need more limeaide. For each base batch, its almost two cans of limeaide I believe.
Great, thanks!
Hey lady...I don't know what the crowd is looking like tonight, but I may need some supplies. And if its gonna be packed tomorrow, I'll definitely need m
e know. :)
ore stuff. If you want to get everything in one go, let me know and I'll text the list. Note, I live right by the market so I can pick stuff up too. Lemm
I can do a run today...txt the list!
Ice (3), toothpicks (2), cups (2), sprite (5), limeade (5)...and maybe a container of Gummi bears just in case...I'm doing an approximation, but on the '
enough plus one' end of the scale...this should be enough to do four full batches of punch. I'll play it by ear, but definitely save ur receipts just in
case we have unused stuff. :)
Did you find all 6 of the limeades j bought yesterday?
And awesome, will get all that
Yeah! Got the limeade, but booze brain here can't remember how many she used yesterday :) I'll calculate fully tonight.
Cool :-)
Sprite anddddd? Ice? Drunk brain fail
Ha! Yeah.
Not a fail....a slight skid. ;)
Yeah one each
1 each, yes? Sorry....
Heh, I think my brain has rug burn...
Thanks!
:-) yup.
Hey lady...whats up with the potluck???
Oh yeah :)
9 pm tonight! Sorry if I didn't txt you, agh! You can come right?
At zacs
Yay!
What is zac's address?? I think I've been there before but I want to be sure I have the right place in mind?
Ok yeah!!! Thanks :)
1850 hope st
Ok...I'm leaving after act one :/ I'm drunk and understimulated.....follow my lead if you wish...freezer forty it is :) I have no idea what's going on...
I might not make it....aaaahhhhh. :)
I hope so...I'm waiting...maybe its a trap...its dark enough now...runnnn!!!!!
....there is an intermission, right? Right??????
Yup
I thnk... After this scene...yea...
Tamale campfire cookout sun feb 5th @ 3 til 9pm.1521 n hancock. please rsvp 4 tamale head count but all welcome last minute.
Sweet! I love tamales. Rsvpeed!
Yay!!!
I am bringin 3 or 4 people around 5:30, if thats ok! Tamalllle
Yup :)
At tranny if you feel like havin a drunk and makin fake meat!
I'll stop by after my cup of tea. :-)
I'm here.. .there's some dude sitting on the stoop chillin
Down in a sec!
do you wanna come by on Saturday to set up?
I was just thinking about you this morning. ..sure , what time-ish?
We'll be there starting at 10 am so any time after that!
OK, sounds good. ..I'll wrar my workin clothes :-)
Sweet...it is indeed quite dusty and warm there, so be warned!
Got it! :-)
On my way in five.
I went and I didn't see anyone, so I went home :-[
:-( we haven't left the saw, just drinkin whiskey out back. You hang with us next time!
Yes. ..for sure :-) tomorrow I'll come early to set up and get beer chilled and whatnot.
Sweet!
Hey lady. ..I was wondering if you could get four bags of ice. ..one extra bag for my mixed beer box. ..that its if its a packed night tonight. I went th
rough kenzingers and new Bolds fast Monday, so I want to keep extras chilled.
Gotcha. Thx! And thanks for the tally sheet, that was super helpful
No problem.. .I'll do it from now on.
Since we have Sooo much wine, I'll try to just ’sell’ that over the
beer. If someone must have beer, I'll give it to them. With that
said, I'll only need two bags of ice :-)
Gotcha!
Sooo...we still have lots of wine and one box of beer. I'm not sure what the mix is, but I sold out of what I had chilled last night.. .beer lovin' crowd
s. I have a granny cart and live near a distributor, I can pick something up maybe?
I can get more beers, no worries! Gonna be a crazy crowd tonight. I saw you hustlin that wine :-) those people had hearts of stone to refuse you!
:'( :-) I know right...maybe discount the wine to $2-3? I can do new signs. Exciting and dad tonight will be.
No, they'll drink it when there's nothing left :-)
hey lady...are you guys gonna be out there for a while? im going to come by and watch you play pool.
Yea!! Come!
almost there...on the el now :-)
Sounds lovely! Wish I could make it, but My company party starts at 6:30 :-( happy belated birthday!
Thank you :-)...that sounds fun too. Well, there will be other parties in the yard eventually. You'll definitely get the invite.
Stupid rain.. ...so I think I want to postpone this shindig...tomorrow night and Sunday night are clear.. .which works better for everyone?
Either! Yay! (secretly glad :-) )
e time will be at 8 instead of 7:30. :-)
OK. ..the majority of responders chose Saturday, so Saturday it will be.. sorry Sunday folks.. .you're still welcome to come if you can make it. Also, th
Bah, and now I have super cold :-( I so wish I could come!
:( Aw. I know you would be otherwise. ...stupid illnesses with masks and underwear on the outside.
Warm snuggle hugs.
Heh. Have a lovely night!
Are you at work? And if so, where is that? I have yr compact and will be close by soon!
Sweet! Yes I am. ..I'm at Brodo...its just below market on 18th. Its on the left with the big yellow flags that say open on them :-)
Gotcha!
